Tests whether home moves the caret to the beginning of line inside a content-editable in an uneditable table.

Dump of markup 1:
| "
      "
| <div>
|   id="l1"
|   "The caret is initially <#selection-caret>here but should move to the beginning of the line."
| "
      "
| <div>
|   "dummy text"
| "
    "
